Windows Server.How do I install Windows Server?: To install Windows Server, start by inserting the installation media and booting from it...
Windows Server.How do I create a virtual machine in Hyp: To create a VM in Hyper-V, open Hyper-V Manager and follow the wizard...

Office 365.How do I create a new user in Office 365: Log in to the Microsoft 365 admin center and navigate to Users > Active users...
Office 365.How do I reset a password in Office 365?: Go to the Users section in the Microsoft 365 admin center, select the user, and click Reset password...
